snippet: Police officers swarmed the living quarters of workers at a platinum mine, searching for illegal weapons as part of a new government push to end a series of violent strikes.
abstract: Hundreds of police officers swarm the living quarters of workers at platinum mine in South Africa, searching for illegal weapons as part of government's new push to end the violent wildcat strikes that have unsettled the nation.
lead_paragraph: Police officers swarmed the living quarters of workers at a platinum mine, searching for illegal weapons as part of a new government push to end a series of violent strikes.

headline.main: South Africa Raids Homes for Weapons of Miners
headline.print_headline: South Africa Raids Homes For Weapons Of Miners
